This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1068 Sq.
Ft.
Comfort comes easy at Peaks Landing.
Our Conyers apartments are the perfect place to call home.
We have crafted our community to cater to your unique needs.
Everyone from families, roommates, and anyone in between will enjoy the welcoming atmosphere of our community and apartment homes.
Finding an apartment for rent in Conyers, GA, is easy when you lease from Peaks Landing.
Our garden style 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments are just what you need to simplify your home search.
The space you want is waiting for you at Peaks Landing.
Features:

•	Fully Equipped Kitchen, •	Separate Dining Area, •	Spacious One, Two & Three Bedroom Residences, •	Laundry Room with Full Size Washer & Dryer Connections, •	Pet Friendly, •	Central Heat and Air Conditioning, •	Additional Outside Storage, •	Total Electric Homes, •	Large Walk-In Closets, •	Waterside Views*, •	Linen Closets*, •	Full Size Washer & Dryer Units*, •	White Custom Cabinetry or Modern Grey Cabinetry, •	Private Patios & Balconies, •	Tiled Entryways*
Community Amenities:

•	Detached Garages Available, •	Dog Park, •	Fully Equipped Fitness Center, •	Package Center, •	Complimentary Poolside Wi-Fi Access, •	24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, •	Poolside Outdoor Kitchen, •	Outside Storage Space Available, •	Car Detailing Center, •	Open Parking, •	Resort Style Swimming Pool with Sundeck, •	Controlled Access Entry, •	Walking Distance to Retail Centers, Restaurants & Cinemas
Pet Policy
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $300 pet fee for one pet, and $500 for two pets.
Pet rent is $20 per month.
There is a weight limit of 80 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Please contact us for more information.
Income Requirements:
You must make 3 times the rent to qualify and is based on your combined gross monthly income.
